info.title: Swagger Opencell App Config File
info.description: This is an Opencell Restful API server.  You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).  For this API, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.
